backend/main.mo: Motoko canister providing access-controlled user profiles and mastering project management with create, update, and query operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented i18n and localization features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files describing their purpose, UI behavior, and i18n integration.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind setup defining OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes and applying global background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the main React bundle into the root element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring theme, i18n, routing, layout, header language switcher, and authentication-driven studio navigation.
frontend/src/audio/engine.ts: Web Audio mastering engine implementing EQ, saturation, compression, limiting, stereo width, and reference track processing.
frontend/src/audio/metadata.ts: Defines audio metadata and validates audio files, then extracts duration and format details using AudioContext.
frontend/src/audio/presets.ts: Defines mastering preset interface and a set of EQ, compression, saturation, stereo width, and gain presets.
frontend/src/audio/wavExport.ts: Renders processed audio to a WAV blob using an OfflineAudioContext and a full mastering chain based on a preset.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Shows a modal prompting new authenticated users to set a display name and saves it via mutation.
frontend/src/components/HelpFAQ.tsx: Displays a localized FAQ section with questions and answers.
frontend/src/components/i18n/LanguageSwi: Dropdown UI to switch application language between Portuguese and English.
frontend/src/components/projects/Project: Lists user projects with preset info, timestamps, and deletion support, using localized text.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the userâ€™s identity and refreshes related queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity state handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useProjects.ts: Defines React Query hooks to fetch, create, and delete mastering projects via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Implements hooks to fetch and update the caller's user profile using React Query and the backend actor.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Provides an i18n context with language state, translations, and persistence via localStorage.
frontend/src/i18n/presets.ts: Contains localized names and descriptions for mastering presets in English and Portuguese.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Defines the full translation schema and strings for all UI text in English and Portuguese.
frontend/src/i18n/useI18n.ts: Exports a hook that returns the current i18n context values.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining color variables, themes, and utility classes for the UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, wrapping it in Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/Landing.tsx: Implements the landing page UI with hero content, workflow steps, and login-or-navigate behavior.
frontend/src/pages/MasteringStudio.tsx: Main mastering UI handling audio uploads, metadata extraction, preset selection, playback modes, reference tracks, exporting, and project creation.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, typography, animations, and container settings with custom plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing features, architecture notes, and versioned requirements for the mastering platform.
